title: Supp (Pyke Main) is searching for a team

embed.title: VuAalon - Summoner Stats - League of Legends
embed.description: VuAalon / Silver 5 18LP / 12W 32L Win Ratio 27% / Pyke - 0W 6L Win Ratio 0%, Morgana - 0W 1L Win Ratio 0%

body:
If you play support you are still waiting and waiting for a good ADC...
It's so sad if you have better stats as your ADC...
 {{champion:555}}
Sometimes you have some people which are AFK...sometimes you have a ADC with no damage...sometimes you are playing Support and wondering what the hell is going on...
Yeah that's a life of Pyke.
I only play LoL since about 2 months and in solo-ranked I was falling down down down down - if you check out my profile I definitly don't have that horrible stats what you thinking about ^^
{{item:3400}} {{summoner:14}} {{item:3400}}
I'm totally friendly - I share my gold with you and burn down the enemies!
 {{champion:555}}
OK finally I'm new in this game but searching for a good team/ADC!
I mainly play Pyke, sometimes Tresh on other champions I definitly need more experience. A few mistakes coming out sometimes because missing experience. If you are interested to play with me or want to know more about me - comment this post.

_Cheers_
**_Vu_**
